plot: Caillou is playing in the park with Clementine. She's a lot more confident about most things than he is and she isn't at all scared to go on the big kids' slide. Caillou is frightened, but he can't bring himself to admit it to Clementine. She teases him anyway. When Dad comes to fetch Caillou they go down the slide together. Caillou discovers it isn't so scary after all and does it all by himself.—Anonymous
